name: Madhouse
text:
Sandwiches, Wraps, Burgers
served with choice of fries, house salad, caesar salad, coleslaw, fresh veggies, rice pilaf (contains pumpkin seeds), soup. substitute sweet potato fries for $2.50

Baked Tomato & Bacon Focaccia Sandwich - $18.50
balsamic marinated tomatoes, bacon, mozzarella, spinach, red pepper cream cheese

Madhouse Chicken Club - $18.50
grilled chicken, bacon, roasted red pepper, greens, tomato, roasted garlic aioli – served on focaccia

Mad Veggie Burger - $19 (V)
mushroom, rice & cheese patty, sautéed mushrooms, swiss cheese, greens, tomato, roasted garlic aioli – served on brioche bun

Falafel Wrap - $18 (V)*
house made falafel, crisp iceberg lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red onion, tzatziki

Chicken Parm Sandwich - $19
hand breaded chicken breast – fried, house-made marinara, mozzarella, parmesan, roasted garlic aioli – served on a portuguese bun

Maple BBQ Burger - $22
8 oz locally produced beef patty, bacon, medium cheddar, crispy onions, maple whiskey bbq sauce, roasted garlic aioli – served on kaiser

Madhouse Burger - $19
8 oz locally produced beef patty, greens, tomato, onion – served on a kaiser
(add cheese or bacon $1.75)

Fish Tacos (2) - $18.25
lightly battered cod topped with salsa fresca, lettuce, citrus aioli and side chipotle tartar

Pasta
Madhouse Chicken & Bacon Linguini - $26
sundried tomatoes, mushrooms, spinach in a wine alfredo sauce

Madhouse Vegetarian Linguini - $24
portobello mushrooms, sundried tomatoes, mushrooms, spinach in a wine alfredo sauce

Mad Seafood Linguine - $28
scallops, shrimp, mussels, sundried tomatoes, mushrooms, spinach in a wine alfredo sauce

Bar Snacks
Beer Cheese - $17 (V)
Thunder Oak gouda, local ale, apple, green onion, honey drizzle, baked salted pretzel

Belgian Fries - $10 (V)
thick cut fries served with roasted garlic aioli

Sweet Potato Fries - $10.75 (V)
served with roasted garlic aioli

Seared Mushrooms - $14 (V)*
quartered mushrooms, garlic, lemon, cajun spice, served with parmesan naan wedges

Buffalo Chicken Dip - $18
spicy seasoned cream cheese dip with chicken, served with corn chips

Naan with Three Spreads - $15 (V)*
tzatziki, roasted red pepper, olive tapenade, spiced olives, aged gouda

Crostini - $17 (V)
baguette topped with lemon & herb whipped ricotta, basil, olive tapenade, grape tomatoes, drizzled with olive oil and black pepper

Madhouse Faves
Coconut Shrimp (6) - $16.50
served with sweet chili sauce

Seafood Sautée - $16.50*
linguine sautéed in white wine and garlic with shrimp, scallops, sun dried tomatoes, leeks, caper – served with focaccia

Chorizo & Tostas - $16.50*
grilled chorizo sausage sautéed in a rich tomato sauce, spinach, Thunder Oak gouda, spiced olives – served with focaccia

Buffalo Cauliflower - $16 (V)
breaded cauliflower tossed in mild, medium, hot or mad hot, maple whiskey, baton rouge
served with celery, carrots & blue cheese dressing

Madhouse Mussels - $18*
1LB mussels steamed in vodka tomato cream sauce – served with baguette

Shrimp Au Gratin - $17.50*
six shrimp, topped with melted cheese blend, served with parmesan naan wedges

Fulls
served with choice of two sides

New York Striploin - $28*
grilled AAA 8oz New York – seasoned

Madhouse Stuffed Chicken - $29*
two boneless chicken breasts stuffed with lemon & herb ricotta, sautéed in mushroom cream sauce

Mad Roasted Salmon - $29*
6oz fillet topped with maple ginger glaze

Pub Style Fish & Chips (2 pieces) - $22.50
atlantic cod – beer battered using local ale, house made tartar, belgian fries and coleslaw (no substitutions)

Madhouse Kid's Menu
Mini Mad Cheeseburger

Chicken Tenders

Chicken & Cheese Quesadilla

Buttery Tomato Pasta

Sides
French Fries, Salad, broccoli Veggies and Dip OR Sliced Apple

Drinks
White Milk, Juice Box OR Small Pop

Classics
Nachos - $17.25*
corn chips, cheese, bacon, jalapenos, red & green peppers, tomatoes
served with salsa and sour cream
(vegetarian – black beans)
(add chicken or chorizo - $7)
(add guac - $2)
(extra cheese - $3)

Quesadillas - $17.25
four tortillas, grilled chicken, roasted red peppers, grilled red onion, cheese
served with salsa and sour cream
(add guac - $2)
(vegetarian – black beans)

Wings - (10) $18 (20) $31
unbreaded
served with celery & carrots
dry cajun, salt & pepper, mild, medium, hot, mad hot, maple whiskey, honey garlic, baton rouge (hot & honey garlic), and choice of ranch or blue cheese

Chicken Tenders - $16.50
fried chicken strips with choice of fries or fresh veggies, serverd with honey dill dipping sauce
(tossed in wing sauce - $1.50)

Salads
add chicken to your salad for $7

Madhouse - $14.50 (V)*
mixed greens, cucumber, tomato, red pepper, carrot, red onion
(choice of balsamic, ranch or blue cheese)

Steak and Goat Cheese - $21.50*
mixed greens, grilled veggies (zucchini, red onion, portobello mushrooms, roasted red peppers) fresh cucumber, tomato, goat cheese, NY striploin topped with balsamic reduction and side of balsamic dressing
(vegetarian - $18.50)*

Express Lunch - $16
daily soup served with grilled naan wedges
choice of house or ceasar salad

Classic Caesar - $15*
romaine, bacon, parmesan cheese, croutons, asiago caesar dressing

Mediterranean - $19 (V)*
mixed greens, house made falafel, cucumber, pickled onion, grape tomatoes, feta, spiced olives and side of tzatziki & greek dressing

Mad Spin - $19.25*
spinach, red onion, tomato, bacon, roasted pumpkin seeds, grilled chicken, feta & honey dill dressing

General Information
(V) - vegetarian

*can be modified vegan or gluten free (ask your server for details)

Ask about our children's menu (minors are permitted on premises until 8:30 p.m.)

All prices are subject to applicable taxes.
